Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model

Class WinPhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.WinPhase
public class WinPhase
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to verify if the move made results in the player's victory

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Board board
    represents the board of the game
    private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Runnable> commands
    represents the hashMap containing the keys related to the methods checkMovement() and checkBuild()
    private Game game
    represents the game
    private Square initialPosition
    represents the position where the playing builder used to be
    private Player participant
    represents the player who is currently being examined
    private Player player
    represents the player who made the move
    private Square position
    represents the position where the playing builder has been moved

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    WinPhase​(Game game)
    creates a new winPhase

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void atLeastFiveTowers()
    If there are at least five complete towers on the board, this method sets the player who calls it as the winner one, even if the player didn't make the winning move
    void checkBuild​(Player player)
    checks if the building move just performed results in a player's victory
    void checkMovement​(Player player, Square initialPosition, Square position)
    checks if the movement just performed results in a player's victory
    void jumpDownCondition()
    If the player moved its worker down two or more levels, this method sets the player as the winner
    void map()
    initializes the hashMap related to winPhase

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • WinPhase

      public WinPhase​(Game game)
      creates a new winPhase
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • map

      public void map()
      initializes the hashMap related to winPhase

    • checkBuild

      public void checkBuild​(Player player)
      checks if the building move just performed results in a player's victory
      Parameters:
      player - is the player who made the building move

    • checkMovement

      public void checkMovement​(Player player, Square initialPosition, Square position)
      checks if the movement just performed results in a player's victory
      Parameters:
      player - is the player who made the movement
      initialPosition - is the place where the playing worker used to be before the movement
      position - is the place where the playing worker currently is.

    • jumpDownCondition

      public void jumpDownCondition()
      If the player moved its worker down two or more levels, this method sets the player as the winner

    • atLeastFiveTowers

      public void atLeastFiveTowers()
      If there are at least five complete towers on the board, this method sets the player who calls it as the winner one, even if the player didn't make the winning move
